DOC.brief_summary: Study F1J-MC-SBBU examine effect duloxetine treatment woman SUI . The inclusion exclusion criterion Phase 3 study ensure subject clinical diagnosis SUI .
DOC.brief_title: Duloxetine Stress Urinary Incontinence Efficacy Safety Study
DOC.criteria: Present SUI base disease diagnostic criterion , average least one incontinent episode per day screen diary , symptom SUI minimum 3 month prior study entry . Are woman nonchildbearing potential reason hysterectomy , surgery , natural menopause , woman childbearing potential test negative pregnancy time enrollment base urine pregnancy test agree use medically accept mean contraception ( example , intrauterine device [ IUD ] , oral injectable contraceptive , implant , barrier device , sterilization , abstinence , sex vasectomize male partner ) duration study . Women use oral contraceptive hormone replacement therapy must stable dose regimen great equal 3 month prior entry study . Are free UTI symptom negative urine dipstick nitrate leukocyte esterase . Have discrete episode incontinence ( , dry episode continuously leak urine , synchronous increase intraabdominal pressure coughing , sneeze , exercise , etc. ) . Have seven ( 7 ) incontinence episode per week , urinary diurnal frequency eight ( 8 ) less per day nocturia two ( 2 ) less per day denial urge incontinence predominant symptom per micturition history collect Visit 1 . An incontinence episode define easily noticeable leakage urine would wet pad , containment garment , article clothing . Diurnal refers void episode occur normal awake hour . Nocturia refers void episode occur normal sleeping hour wake subject . Suffer severe constipation ( example , impact rectum time physical examination despite recent evacuation ) . Has physical examination , neurological and/or vaginal examination result , opinion investigator , exclude subject . Are medication regimen ( include diuretic ) dose and/or frequency stable least 12 week prior randomization , anticipated change course study . Have major inpatient surgery within 3 month prior study entry . Have current diagnosis follow condition , disorder , disease genitourinary tract : 1 . Ureteric , bladder , urethral , rectal fistula 2 . Uncorrected congenital abnormality lead urinary incontinence 3 . Detrusor instability noncompliant bladder 4 . Adult enuresis 5 . Voiding difficulty ( i.e. , subject complains difficulty empty bladder ) .
